pages.text: The $(mob)Squid$() is a common animal found in bodies of $(thing)Water$(). It swims around aimlessly and flees when attacked.$(p)It suffocates if it stays out of $(thing)Water$() for too long.
$(mob)Squids$() drop $(item)Ink Sacs$() on death. It is used as a black dye, and as such is used to paint various items black, like $(l:minecraft_sheep)$(mob)Wool$().
